name: Herb O'Cide in Escape from the Power Plants
name_original: Herb O'Cide in Escape from the Power Plants
description:
Play as officer Herb O' Cide as he explores a factory overrun by dangerous plants. You must manage your battery to prevent the suit from breaking while destroying all the bloodthirsty vegetation on each floor. The game includes three levels and a bossfight.

This project is a submission for the Reload Magazine / In The Keep Jam. The game uses music from Future Ramen and textures generated by Craiyon, the rest was created by Jackson Clayton.
